metadata.synopsis: Priests of Conquering God can become hostile in FOR. If player leaves combat, priests still apear at Goblin Camp. This dialog happens if they spot a hostile player just to show player the reason why the whole camp suddenly becomes hostile.

0.text: You! I remember you from the forest. You should never have come here.
0.context: NodeContext: They are hostile toward you and will fight you after htis line.
